flawed_nl_solution:
Alma has 47 baby carrots to feed 3 goats, 47 / 4 = <<47/4=10.04>>10.04 baby carrots.
If Alma feeds 10 carrots to each of 4 goats, that's a total of 10 * 4 = <<10*4=40>>40 carrots Alma feeds the goats.
She started with 47 baby carrots - 40 she feeds the goats = <<47-40=7>>7 baby carrots left over.
#### 7
